/>
V.ii.3.B.1.e
.
Improper Use of a Partial Rating Decision for SC for Cause of Death
Do not use a partial rating decision to deny SC for cause of death if development is pending or in progress for another condition possibly involved in the cause of death.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B - Making Partial Rating Decisions
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
